name: Taco Spice Vegan White Bean Quesadilla with Pepper Jack.
recipeIngredient: 15  oz can great northern White beans ch ask black pr pinto beans. (15 oz or about 1.5 cups cooked or other beans of choice su)
1/4 tsp each of garlic powder (onion powder, smoked paprika, chipotle pepper powder, black pepper)
1/2 tsp each of oregano and parsley
1/2 tsp red chile powder (optional or to taste)
fresh salsa or chopped tomato (red onion and cilantro)
daiya pepper jack or homemade pepper jack shredded

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and drain the beans. Toss the beans with the spices and salt in a bowl and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Wash and drain the beans. Toss the beans with the spices and salt in a bowl and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Chop up the veggies. Brush a little oil on the tortilla on one side and place on the grill. top with the spiced beans and red bell pepper. Make fresh salsa with a ripe tomato, red onion, cilantro and green chili chopped and mixed with a pinch of salt, pepper and lemon juice. Or just slice up the tomatoes, onion and cilantro and top the spiced beans. sprinkle a little salt and pepper. top with vegan pepper jack shreds. Top with another tortilla or fold. Grill until the cheese melts.
recipeInstructions.name: Chop up the veggies. Brush a little oil on the tortilla on one side and place on the grill. top with the spiced beans and red bell pepper. Make fresh salsa with a ripe tomato, red onion, cilantro and green chili chopped and mixed with a pinch of salt, pepper and lemon juice. Or just slice up the tomatoes, onion and cilantro and top the spiced beans. sprinkle a little salt and pepper. top with vegan pepper jack shreds. Top with another tortilla or fold. Grill until the cheese melts.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with a dash of chipotle sauce or hot sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with a dash of chipotle sauce or hot sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Make it into a pizza/ open faced quesadilla by baking it for 10-12 minutes at 425 degrees F / 220ºc, like this BBQ chickpea tortilla Pizza.
recipeInstructions.name: Make it into a pizza/ open faced quesadilla by baking it for 10-12 minutes at 425 degrees F / 220ºc, like this BBQ chickpea tortilla Pizza.

recipeInstructions.text: Or saute the white beans for 5 minutes on stove top and make it into a wrap.
recipeInstructions.name: Or saute the white beans for 5 minutes on stove top and make it into a wrap.
